description: The Universal Device Detection library for .NET that parses User Agents and detects devices (desktop, tablet, mobile, tv, cars, console, etc.), clients (browsers, feed readers, media players, PIMs, ...), operating systems, brands and models. This is a port of the popular PHP device-detector library to C#. For the most part you can just follow the documentation for device-detector with no issue.
releaseNotes:
### What's Changed

- Detect new brands: Vormor, Oangcc, SOSH and Detect devices for existing brands Vivo, Xiaomi, Sharp, ZTE 
- Detect mobile apps: Audible, Overcast
- Detect Wolvic VR Browser
- Detect bot: GumGum Verity
- Detect new brands: Everex, GTMEDIA, Guophone, Unitech and Detect devices for existing brands
- Detect new brands: ViBox, WANSA, XElectron and Detect devices for existing brands: Samsung, ZTE, Xiaomi, iTel 
- Detect devices for exists brands: LG, Energy Sistem, SmartBook, Arnova 
- Detect new brand BMXC and Detect devices for exist brands 
- Detect new brands: V-Gen, Nedaphone and Detect devices for exist brands
- Detect new brands: Frunsi, RelNAT, TeloSystems, MIWANG and Detect devices for exist brands 
- Fix possible error if an incorrect version list array is provided
- Detect new brands: HeadWolf, Great Asia, Zamolxe, ZoomSmart and Detect devices for exist brands
- Detect new brands: PC Smart, Ephone, YunSong, SYH, iRobot and Detect devices for exist brands
- Overwrite device type smartphone - if UA contains a'prefix, Pad/APad
- Detect new brands: Attila, BRAVE and Detect devices for exist brands
- Detect new brands: Roam Cat, DIMO, Everest, SANY and Detect devices for exist brands
